Package fr.univartois.cril.approximation.util.collections.heaps

Class HeapFactory

java.lang.Object
fr.univartois.cril.approximation.util.collections.heaps.HeapFactory
public final class HeapFactory extends Object
The HeapFactory enables to easily create parameterized instances of Heap.

  • Method Details

    • newMaximumHeap

      public static <E extends Heapable & Comparable<? super E>> Heap<E> newMaximumHeap(int capacity)
      Creates a new heap with a descending order. The elements are ordered using their natural order.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the elements in the heap.
      Parameters:
      capacity - The initial capacity of the heap.
      Returns:
      The created heap.

      public static <E extends Heapable> Heap<E> newMaximumHeap(int capacity, Comparator<? super E> comparator)
      Creates a new heap with a descending order. The elements are ordered using the given comparator.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the elements in the heap.
      Parameters:
      capacity - The initial capacity of the heap.
      comparator - The comparator used to compare the elements in the heap.

      The created heap.

      Creates a new heap with a descending order. The elements are ordered using their natural order.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the elements in the heap.
      Parameters:
      capacity - The initial capacity of the heap.
      cache - The supplier for the cache to use to retrieve elements in constant time.

      The created heap.
